R13-WZ63. R13S0109-S131A. About the designer: Since its debut in 2009, R13's avant-garde denim silhouettes have garnered a cult status among those aiming to capture the rebellious American spirit. To achieve a vintage feel that doesn't warp or stretch, R13 uses Italian and Turkish denim produced in Italy, which features pure indigo casting along with machine hand washing techniques. The look is sharp and edgy, fit for the person who is effortlessly cool and fashion forward in their style.

products.name: Women's Arizona Soft Footbed Metallic Leather Sandal
products.brandedName: Birkenstock Women's Arizona Soft Footbed Metallic Leather Sandal
products.unbrandedName: Women's Arizona Soft Footbed Metallic Leather Sandal
products.description: Introducing the Birkenstock Women's Arizona Soft Footbed Metallic Leather Sandal, a stylish and comfortable addition to your summer wardrobe. Crafted with metallic copper leather and rose gold-tone hardware, these sandals exude a chic and trendy vibe. The original Birkenstock suede-lined natural cork footbed provides unparalleled comfort with its pronounced arch support, deep heel cup, and roomy toe box. The rubber sole offers traction for all-day wear. Made in Germany, these sandals are not only fashionable but also durable. Please Note - Size Selections Are European. For US Conversions Please Reference Size Chart. Elevate your summer look with these luxurious Birkenstock sandals.
